EmailTemplate.name: 18-NFI:TEPS_TXLE-Partners noncampaign-Email-Digital Training-T003JS.Email
EmailTemplate.subject: The Nokia Partner Learning Store goes mobile
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Speed. Innovation. Agility. Winning starts with the right training … in the right format. Success today requires a workforce with the skills to compete effectively. The Nokia Partner Learning Store <[[https://learningstore.nokia.com/partner?did=d0000000019d&utm_campaign=partners_noncampaign&utm_source=email-list-partner-distribution&utm_medium=email]]> is our education learning platform for training programs designed to ensure partners are prepared and effective in their jobs. But in today’s digital world, we need learning at our fingertips … on any device at any time. We are happy to report that The Learning Store has gone mobile, allowing you to learn on the go from any mobile device - iPhone, iPad, Windows phone and Android.
- Browse the catalog and discover what’s in store - Launch specific content directly from the Partner Store - Register for courses and check progress in The Nokia Learning & Development Hub
How to Install Available on iOS, Android and Windows phones. Simply install the Partner Store web app on your device by following the instructions below. iOS (iPhone and iPad)
- Launch Safari browser and navigate to http://tiny.cc/partnerstore <[[http://tiny.cc/partnerstore]]>. - Tap SHARE button on browser’s toolbar - that’s the rectangle with an arrow pointing upward (it is on the bar at the bottom of the screen on an iPhone or iPod Touch). - Tap ADD to Home Screen icon in the Share menu. - You will be prompted to name the shortcut before tapping the ADD button. The shortcut can be dragged around and placed anywhere.
Android
- Launch Chrome for Android and open http://tiny.cc/partnerstore <[[http://tiny.cc/partnerstore]]> - Tap the menu button and tap ADD to home screen. - You will be able to enter a name for the shortcut and then Chrome will add it to your home screen.
Windows phone
- Launch IE and open http://tiny.cc/partnerstore <[[http://tiny.cc/partnerstore]]> - Tap the menu button and tap ADD to home screen.
Whether from your mobile device or computer, the following featured resources will help you get started on your learning path today. Partner Training / Certification Catalog <https://www.partners.nokia.com/s/documentpage?Id=0692M00000IEBAMQA5> EMEA Partner Open Catalog Schedule Q1 2019 <https://www.partners.nokia.com/s/documentpage?Id=0692M00000IEihYQAT> How to Complete your certification? <[[https://learningstore.nokia.com/partner/doc/How-to-Complete-Your-Certification-Nokia.pdf?did=d0000000019d&utm_campaign=partners_noncampaign&utm_source=email-list-partner-distribution&utm_medium=email]]> How to Print your certification? <https://www.partners.nokia.com/s/contentdocument/069410000074qA1>
If you have questions or require support, please contact the NokiaEDU Global Contact Center at gcc.nokiaedu@nokia.com <[[mailto:gcc.nokiaedu@nokia.com]]>.
The Nokia Global Partner Program Team © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia.
